name: Travel Bingo Ultimate Adventure
description:
Enjoy traveling with kids while playing this classic family friendly "I spy" game. It makes road trips and simple drives around town a fun adventure for all.

Travel Bingo For Kids includes 49 Free 'Small Town' tiles and with randomized placements, each game is a unique and fun experience.

Small Town - Included for Free!

** 5 Additional Categories Are Available! **
+ Neighborhood
+ Country Roads
+ Big City
+ Interstate
+ Letters & Numbers

All categories contain tiles appropriate to the area and enable you to have fun regardless of your destination.
